noblePhantasms.name: Eightfold Blessing of Amaterasu
noblePhantasms.detail: Reduce skill cooldown by 1 & restore HP & increase NP Gauge <effect increases with Overcharge> for all allies

noblePhantasms.name: Eightfold Blessing of Amaterasu
noblePhantasms.detail: Reduce skill cooldown by 1 & restore HP ▲ & increase NP Gauge <effect increases with Overcharge> for all allies

comments.comment:
A shrine maiden who wanted nothing more but to be a good wife.
She served Emperor Toba at the end of the Heian period and was known as the most beautiful woman of her day.
Some say that she's actually the Nine-Tail Demon Fox in disguise.
Well, a lot happened and she was chased from the palace, then gave herself up to humans and stuff.

Height/Weight: 160cm, 49kg
Origin: Japanese mythology. One of the Three Great Demons.
Region: Japan
Alignment: Neutral-Evil
Gender: Female
"Yes? I'm a fox, and a shrine maiden. Is that a problem?"

Her desire to find a lover pours out of her.
A totally Gyaru Servant, but really, all she ever wanted was to "devote herself to someone."
Her childhood name was Mikuzume.
She started serving in the palace at the age of 18.
Later she changed her name to Tamamo-no-Mae and served directly under Emperor Toba.
Due to her unparalleled beauty and her vast wisdom, she was adored by the Emperor.

『Eightfold Blessing of Amaterasu』
Rank: D (Down from EX)
NP Type: Anti-Army
Suiten Nikkou Amaterasu-no-Shizuishi
A Noble Phantasm in the shape of a mirror. This is the temporarily released form of a divine treasure called Tamamo Shizuishi.
Normally this powerful treasure is capable of even reviving the dead, but she lacks the ability to draw that power out now.

Curse (Dakini Spell): EX
A spell to either acquire social status and wealth (for males,) or love from those in power (for females.)
Allows the user to attain power, and even realize one's own time of death.
But since Tamamo was traumatized in the past, she doesn't really want to use this skill.

Fox's Wedding : EX
Tamamo's own version of the skill Item Construction.
By one-sidedly announcing her marriage, she can cause a rain of blessings to fall, and any friendly-ish targets will be forced to give her presents to celebrate.
An OP skill matching her personality!
Cut that out, Amaterasu!

To repent her past sins, she cut off her tails and fell to the status of a one-tail fox.
If she goes through another millennium of training, she might be able to become a nine-tail fox again.
By the way, each of the tails she cut off has the exact same spiritual power and spiritual core as her.
Even if she goes through an Ascension, rest assured, the most she will become is a three-tail.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle: Master! It's your birthday! ...You have a birthday?

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle: Mmhmm, nothing gets by these ears. There's an event underway!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Shall we go on a quest? I'm feeling restless.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Our Master-Servant relationship?
Don't worry, your wish is my command!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: This whole Master-Servant thing is all about the strong controlling the weak, right?

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: What do I like? Well, my tiny little home, of course! Not that I've ever lived anywhere spacious...

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle: What don't I like... Well, looking back at all that I lack is definitely exhausting...

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: The Holy Grail?! You KNOW nothing good ever comes from tales like that! No way! No thank you!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I am here to serve you as your humble Servant!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Traveling through time can be quite stressful, I'm sure. Do get some rest.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
My, my, Master, saving humankind?
Wait, you don't think someone from my household is behind this, do you? N-No way, right?

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm getting used to this. I could grow to like big places like this.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am simply a foe to be beaten like any other, but I will do as you command.
Come, Master. Let us save the world!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Um, Kintoki? Could you, just, you know, stay away?
Your static electricity is really messing with my fur!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, you there, Emperor. You sure do like to sing of freedom, don't you?
You DO know that one misstep and you'll be headed down a dark path, right?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Are you caring for Elisabeth properly?
Despite her looks, she actually gets quite lonely, you know. She has lots of competition too, so make sure you help cheer her up sometimes, okay?

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 500300_0_G010]That made my tail stand on end!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 500300_0_G030]My, my, are you sure you wish to spend time with me?

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 500300_0_G020]They've still got a ways to grow. I'll let you guess what I'm talking about.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text: I will always be there for you![sr]Your reliable Shrine Maiden Fox, Caster, has now arrived!
voiceLines.subtitle:
I will always be there for you!
Your reliable Shrine Maiden Fox, Caster, has now arrived!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hoh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Here!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Hiyah!

voiceLines.name: Attack 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Hiyahhhhh! Hah hah hah!

voiceLines.name: Attack 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Cartwheel!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Scatter and perish before the Higanbana Sesshouseki!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Gather the yin energy! Tamamo Resentment Shot!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Oh, how I will curse you!

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: A good wife always makes do!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Here goes!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: And I'm off!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: This is way too easy♪

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Now then, shall I chop you up and cook you?

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Nghh?!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Ouch, stop! Stop, please!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I should have set aside my grudges...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Oww! That's it, I'm going home...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Haha!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Mikon!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Now then!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Ready to see what a god is really made of?

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 500300_0_B050]O gods of Izumo!
[id 500300_0_B051]Let this be the proof of your purity, as this mirror becomes your sacred treasure...
[id 500300_0_B052]Eightfold Blessing of Amaterasu!
[id 500300_0_B053]Or... You know, something like that!

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 500300_2_G010]That made my tail stand on end!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 500300_2_G040]Ehehe... I'm getting all fired up... I am getting really fired up...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 500300_2_G050]To think you would offer an Anti-Hero like me so much compassion... [id 500300_2_G051]It's like a dream come true, but seems ever so fleeting... [id 500300_2_G052]Won't this just make our goodbyes so much harder?

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hoh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Here!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: No worries in Toyoashihara♥

voiceLines.name: Attack 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Shall we proceed?

voiceLines.name: Attack 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Shall we go for divine punishment?

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Welcome back, honey!♥

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Cheerful training♥ Tamamo Heart Shot!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Exorcise...purify...hiya!♥

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: The light upon the water's surface, this shall be your blessing...

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I shall silence the enemy as gracefully as a breeze blowing through a rice paddy.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: And I'm off!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Are you tired? Then let's have some dinner.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: If that is the loser, then they are mine. Now then, what should I do with them...

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ahh...!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Oh, please stop...!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm going to go home...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Paper armor... That's right, it's paper armor...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Haha!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Mikon!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Now then!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: So you wish for a great bounded field, do you not?

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 500300_2_B050]Multitudinous evils swarm about this world... [delay 3.5]
My blessed sacred mirror shall purify them all.
[id 500300_2_B051]I will serve with all I have!
[id 500300_2_B052]Behold, the Blessing of Amaterasu!
